oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Interview with T-Bone Burnett - 2000-12-15
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Interview with T-Bone Burnett with Chris Deritis on December 12, 2000. Engineered by Matt Marrin.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: T-Bone Burnett;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Interview with T-Bone Burnett conducted by Chris Deritis for Ground Zero. Subject matter includes; Oh Brother, Where Art Thou project-- Coen brothers -- Man Of Constant Sorrow -- Record production work -- Elvis Costello's King Of America album and the song Indoor Fireworks -- August and Everything After album by Counting Crows -- Influence of Hip Hop on production -- Meeting Gillian Welch and making the Revival album -- Gillian's help during the Oh Brother, Where Art Thou project -- Ralph Stanley and the Stanley Brothers -- Evolution of bluegrass music -- Oh, Death -- Researching music for the Oh Brother project -- You Are My Sunshine and the 4th verse of same -- Recording techniques used in the Oh Brother project -- Recording and filming at the Ryman Auditorium -- Chris Thomas King project -- Latest album project with Gillian Welch -- The current state of music -- Film soundtrack and stage play work.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: Tbone interview - J538-2; T-Bone on left channel - Chris on right channel
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Burnett, T-Bone; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
